title: 09/17/21 PHD comic: 'The COVID-19 Virus Explained'
description: Piled Higher & Deeper by Jorge Cham www.phdcomics.com title: "The COVID-19 Virus Explained" - originally published 9/17/2021 For the latest news in PHD Comics, CLICK HERE!
